text: E angazangarimɨn aruir gumazibar mɨn deraghvɨra daruam. E dɨpar onganibar amɨva onganan kogh, egh pura gumazamiziba isɨ pamten dɨmɨva ighiar kurabar arazibar amuan markɨ. Egh gumaziba ko amiziba pura tintinibar uari ko dakuva, afiar arazibar amuan markɨ. Egh uari uariv soghɨva, egh munavɨn biziba bagh navim ikuvighɨva da inisɨ navim isian markɨ.
